comment._content: You're invited to post this picture in Wales Online Photography Flickr Group (POST 1 ~ AWARD 1) ***After you have added your photo to Wales Online Photography Flickr Group & friends pool, when your photo has received 3 Group Awards, please share it in our Wales Online Photography Flickr Group & friends Award Winner's Gallery ***

comment.author: 51094066@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Llangwm and Black Tar, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 51094066@N00
comment._content: Thanks for adding this to Llangwm and Black Tar group.  This is a fabulous image of the foreshore at Llangwm which is still quite recognizable.  Next time I am there I will try to create a matching shot.

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Old photos of Pembrokeshire, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 89545286@N05
comment._content: My parents own Curlew Cottage nearby - it's an old fisherman's cottage. This family might have lived there! Can I get a print of this?

comment.author: 11334970@N05
comment._content: Hi ellie356, If you visit our Collections site at collections.rmg.co.uk/collections/objects/23569.html you will be able to find out more about this photograph as well as buy an image of it. Thanks Lucinda
